text: Mu by’ukuri, babandi bemeye (ubutumwa bwa Muhamadi), Abayahudi (abemeye ubutumwa bwa Musa ku gihe cye), Abakirisitu (abemeye ubutumwa bwa Yesu ku gihe cye) n’Abaswaabi’i (abagumye kuri kamere yabo yo kwemera Imana batagira idini bayobotse muri icyo gihe), (muri abo bose) abemeye Allahby’ukuri, bakemera umunsi w’imperuka ndetse bakanakora ibitunganye, nta bwoba bazagira habe n’agahinda
